name: Game Design 101
description:
Game Design 101 is a game about making games

You are a struggling cs student in a game design class. Your task is to create 1 game. Be careful with your choices though, because you can easily fail this task. Don't take it personally! 

(っ＾▿＾)っ

To play: press the space bar for the next page, click on options when the menu appears

Music credit:
